greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Mirror image of triangle A080233.
comment: Inverse of A239473. Equals A007318*A167374. - _Tom Copeland_, Nov 14 2016
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..50 of the triangle, flattened
formula: T(n,k) = binomial(n,k) - binomial(n,k+1) = Sum_{i=-k-1..k+1} (-1)^(i+1) * binomial(n,k+1+i) * binomial(n+2,k+1-i). - _Mircea Merca_, Apr 28 2012
mathematica: Table[Binomial[n, k] -Binomial[n, k+1], {n,0,10}, {k,0,n}]//Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 24 2016 *)
program: flatten([[A156644(n,k) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..12)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 28 2021
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 12 2009
